/help.description: Displays all available commands or information about a specific command.

/give.description: Gives an item to a player. If omitted, gives a full stack.

/weather.description: Changes the world's weather (clear, rain, thunder).

/gamemode.description: Changes a player's game mode (survival, creative, spectator, adventure).

/summon.description: Spawns a mob or object at the player's location.

/tp.description: Teleports a player to another player or coordinates.

/time set.description: Sets the world time (day, night, or ticks).

/locatebiome.description: Finds the nearest biome of a specific type.

/msg.description: Sends a private message to another player.

/ops.description: Lists all players with operator privileges.

/perf.description: Runs debugging for 10 seconds, generating performance logs.

/save-all.description: Automatically backs up the world (saves current state).

/restart.description: Restarts the server after shutting down.

/ban.description: Adds a player to the ban list.

/pardon.description: Removes a player from the ban list.

/op.description: Grants operator powers to a player.

/deop.description: Revokes operator privileges from a player.

/difficulty.description: Sets the server difficulty (peaceful, easy, normal, hard).
